title: Download RADOLAN Data
code: # If required, install the remotes package from CRAN # install.packages("remotes")  # Install kwb.dwd from GitHub remotes::install_github("KWB-R/kwb.dwd")  # Install the current development version remotes::install_github("KWB-R/kwb.dwd@dev")

what: List files available on DWD’s FTP server
title: Download RADOLAN Data
text: package contains function lists files available FTP server. allows recursive listing, .e. listing files folders subfolders. example, list historical RADOLAN files, : takes six seconds get file list. file paths file names (listed 2022-04-27) also contained data frame dwd_files available package. can browse data frame find files looking :
code: # Define the URL to the historical RADOLAN files url <- kwb.dwd:::ftp_path_cdc("grids_germany/daily/radolan/historical")  # List all historical RADOLAN files urls <- kwb.dwd::list_url(url, recursive = TRUE) # Get data frame of all files dwd_files <- kwb.dwd::dwd_files  # Filter for historical RADOLAN files radolan_files <- dwd_files[grep("radolan/historical", dwd_files$file), ]  # Shorten the path for better display radolan_files$path <- gsub("^grids_germany/", "", radolan_files$file)  # Show the first file paths head(kwb.utils::resetRowNames(radolan_files)) #>                                                               file isdir #> 1 grids_germany/daily/radolan/historical/bin/2006/SF-200610.tar.gz FALSE #> 2 grids_germany/daily/radolan/historical/bin/2006/SF-200611.tar.gz FALSE #> 3 grids_germany/daily/radolan/historical/bin/2006/SF-200612.tar.gz FALSE #> 4 grids_germany/daily/radolan/historical/bin/2007/SF-200701.tar.gz FALSE #> 5 grids_germany/daily/radolan/historical/bin/2007/SF-200702.tar.gz FALSE #> 6 grids_germany/daily/radolan/historical/bin/2007/SF-200703.tar.gz FALSE #>        size permissions modification_time user group links #> 1   7451505  -rw-r--r--  2020-03-30 00:00 9261 15101     1 #> 2  53109545  -rw-r--r--  2020-03-30 00:00 9261 15101     1 #> 3 138991915  -rw-r--r--  2020-03-30 00:00 9261 15101     1 #> 4 228995524  -rw-r--r--  2020-03-30 00:00 9261 15101     1 #> 5 174957194  -rw-r--r--  2020-03-30 00:00 9261 15101     1 #> 6 186723651  -rw-r--r--  2020-03-30 00:00 9261 15101     1 #>                                                 path #> 1 daily/radolan/historical/bin/2006/SF-200610.tar.gz #> 2 daily/radolan/historical/bin/2006/SF-200611.tar.gz #> 3 daily/radolan/historical/bin/2006/SF-200612.tar.gz #> 4 daily/radolan/historical/bin/2007/SF-200701.tar.gz #> 5 daily/radolan/historical/bin/2007/SF-200702.tar.gz #> 6 daily/radolan/historical/bin/2007/SF-200703.tar.gz  # Show the last file paths tail(kwb.utils::resetRowNames(radolan_files)) #>                                                                                                           file #> 580                                           grids_germany/hourly/radolan/historical/bin/2021/RW202109.tar.gz #> 581                                           grids_germany/hourly/radolan/historical/bin/2021/RW202110.tar.gz #> 582 grids_germany/hourly/radolan/historical/bin/DESCRIPTION_gridsgermany-hourly-radolan-historical-bin_en.pdf #>     isdir     size permissions modification_time user group links #> 580 FALSE 22516914  -rw-r--r--  2022-03-17 13:59 9261 15101     1 #> 581 FALSE 33268966  -rw-r--r--  2022-03-17 13:59 9261 15101     1 #> 582 FALSE 29952317  -rw-r--r--  2022-03-17 13:59 9261 15101     1 #> 583 FALSE 35160103  -rw-r--r--  2022-03-17 13:59 9261 15101     1 #> 584 FALSE   134365  -rw-r--r--  2021-07-19 00:00 9261 15101     1 #> 585 FALSE   129857  -rw-r--r--  2021-07-19 00:00 9261 15101     1 #> what: Download zipped RADOLAN files from DWD’s FTP server
title: Download RADOLAN Data
text: output look like :
code: # Set the target directory export_dir <- "~/Downloads/radolan"  # Create required directories kwb.utils::createDirectory(file.path(export_dir, "daily/historical"))  # Download corresponding RADOLAN files from DWD's FTP server kwb.dwd::download_radolan(   resolution = "daily",     export_dir = export_dir,    start_daily = "2018-07",    end_daily = "2018-08" ) Download: 'daily' historical radolan data ...  Download: "daily, historical" and save to ~/Downloads/radolan/daily/historical/SF201807.tar.gz ...  versuche URL 'ftp://opendata.dwd.de/climate_environment/CDC/grids_germany/daily/radolan/historical/bin/2018/SF201807.tar.gz' downloaded 132.2 MB  ok. (1.48s)  Download: "daily, historical" and save to ~/Downloads/radolan/daily/historical/SF201808.tar.gz ...  versuche URL 'ftp://opendata.dwd.de/climate_environment/CDC/grids_germany/daily/radolan/historical/bin/2018/SF201808.tar.gz' downloaded 173.5 MB  ok. (1.97s)  ok. (3.45s)

title: Download RADOLAN Data
code: # Get the paths to the zipped files files <- dir(export_dir, "\\.tar\\.gz", recursive = TRUE, full.names = TRUE)  # Unzip all files to the export directory lapply(files, untar, exdir = path.expand(export_dir))

title: Download RADOLAN Data
code: # Get the paths to all binary Radolan files in the export directory files_bin <- dir(export_dir, "---bin$", full.names = TRUE)  # Read all Radolan files as raster objects raster_objects <- lapply(files_bin, function(file) kwb.utils::catAndRun(   paste("Reading", file),   kwb.dwd::read_binary_radolan_file(file) ))  # Plot the contents of one file raster::plot(raster_objects[[1]])

text: Hauke Sonnenberg. Author, maintainer. Michael Rustler. Contributor. Lukas Guericke. Contributor. . Copyright holder.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Sonnenberg H (2022). kwb.dwd: Access Information Deutscher Wetterdienst (DWD). R package version 0.1.1.9000, https://github.com/KWB-R/kwb.dwd.
code: @Manual{,   title = {kwb.dwd: Access Information from Deutscher Wetterdienst (DWD)},   author = {Hauke Sonnenberg},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.1.1.9000},   url = {https://github.com/KWB-R/kwb.dwd}, }

title: Access Information from Deutscher Wetterdienst (DWD)
text: details install KWB-R packages checkout installation tutorial.
code: ### Optionally: specify GitHub Personal Access Token (GITHUB_PAT) ### See here why this might be important for you: ### https://kwb-r.github.io/kwb.pkgbuild/articles/install.html#set-your-github_pat  # Sys.setenv(GITHUB_PAT = "mysecret_access_token")  # Install package "remotes" from CRAN if (! require("remotes")) {   install.packages("remotes", repos = "https://cloud.r-project.org") }  # Install KWB package 'kwb.dwd' from GitHub remotes::install_github("KWB-R/kwb.dwd")

what: Convert Binary Radolan File to Raster File — convert_bin_to_raster_file
title: Convert Binary Radolan File to Raster File — convert_bin_to_raster_file
text: Convert Binary Radolan File Raster File

title: Convert Binary Radolan File to Raster File — convert_bin_to_raster_file
Convert Binary Radolan File to Raster File — convert_bin_to_raster_file
text: bin_file path binary radolan file vector paths target_dir directory create raster file(s). default files created subfolder "rst" parallel folder first element bin_file resides. dbg TRUE, debug messages shown

text: Crop Radolan Data

title: Crop Radolan Data — crop_radolan_radial
code: crop_radolan_radial(   radolan,   longitude,   latitude,   radius = 10,   as_data_frame = TRUE )

title: Crop Radolan Data — crop_radolan_radial
text: radolan radolan data returned read_relevant_years_radolan longitude longitude latitude latitude radius distance point (latitude/longitude) km as_data_frame TRUE, data frame columns SAMPLE_DATE rain_mean returned, otherwise raster object returned crop

title: Download Radolan Files on DWD Server — download_radolan
Download Radolan Files on DWD Server — download_radolan
text: resolution temporal resolution, one "daily" "hourly" (default: "daily") export_dir export directory (default: "data" current working directory) ... arguments passed get_radolan_urls, start_daily, start_hourly, end_daily, end_hourly

what: Files Available on DWD's FTP Server — dwd_files
title: Files Available on DWD's FTP Server — dwd_files
text: Information files available download ftp://opendata.dwd.de/climate_environment/CDC/ [base_url]. information last updated 2022-04-27.

title: Files Available on DWD's FTP Server — dwd_files
Files Available on DWD's FTP Server — dwd_files
text: data frame 701795 observations 8 variables: file path file [base_url] isdir TRUE directory, FALSE file size file size bytes permissions string indicating file permissions modification_time time last modification file user column provided FTP server group column provided FTP server links column provided FTP server

title: Files Available on DWD's FTP Server — dwd_files
text: ftp://opendata.dwd.de/climate_environment/CDC/Announce_log_CDC_ftp.txt

text: Get URLs DWD Metadata

title: Get URLs to DWD Metadata — get_dwd_urls_metadata
Get URLs to DWD Metadata — get_dwd_urls_metadata
text: list character element representing URL metadata   file provided Deutscher Wetterdienst (DWT), e.g. files   "_Beschreibung_Stationen.txt" describing measurement stations.

what: Get URLs to Available Radolan Files — get_radolan_urls
title: Get URLs to Available Radolan Files — get_radolan_urls
text: Get URLs available radolan files DWD FTP server base address: ftp://opendata.dwd.de/climate_environment/CDC/grids_germany. user can choose daily records hourly records located different paths server. paths files read FTP server generated, given knowledge files reside expected named.

title: Get URLs to Available Radolan Files — get_radolan_urls
code: get_radolan_urls(   start_daily = "2006-10",   start_hourly = "2005-06",   end_daily = format(format = "%Y-%m", lubridate::rollback(Sys.Date(), roll_to_first     = TRUE)),   end_hourly = end_daily,   ... )

title: Get URLs to Available Radolan Files — get_radolan_urls
text: start_daily month string (yyyy-mm) first daily record. Default: "2006-10" start_hourly month string (yyyy-mm) first hourly record. Default: "2005-06" end_daily month string (yyyy-mm) last daily record. Defaults current month. end_hourly month string (yyyy-mm) last hourly records. Defaults end_daily. ... arguments passed kwb.dwd:::get_radolan_url, ftp_root

title: Get URLs to Available Radolan Files — get_radolan_urls
text: list "daily_historical_urls" "hourly_historical_urls"

title: Get URLs to Available Radolan Files — get_radolan_urls
code: # Get all expected URLs urls <- kwb.dwd::get_radolan_urls()  # Show the first URLs of each category (daily, hourly) head(urls$daily_historical_urls) #> [1] "ftp://opendata.dwd.de/climate_environment/CDC/grids_germany/daily/radolan/historical/bin/2006/SF-200610.tar.gz" #> [2] "ftp://opendata.dwd.de/climate_environment/CDC/grids_germany/daily/radolan/historical/bin/2006/SF-200611.tar.gz" #> [3] "ftp://opendata.dwd.de/climate_environment/CDC/grids_germany/daily/radolan/historical/bin/2006/SF-200612.tar.gz" #> [4] "ftp://opendata.dwd.de/climate_environment/CDC/grids_germany/daily/radolan/historical/bin/2007/SF-200701.tar.gz" #> [5] "ftp://opendata.dwd.de/climate_environment/CDC/grids_germany/daily/radolan/historical/bin/2007/SF-200702.tar.gz" #> [6] "ftp://opendata.dwd.de/climate_environment/CDC/grids_germany/daily/radolan/historical/bin/2007/SF-200703.tar.gz" head(urls$hourly_historical_urls) #> [1] "ftp://opendata.dwd.de/climate_environment/CDC/grids_germany/hourly/radolan/historical/bin/2005/RW-200506.tar.gz" #> [2] "ftp://opendata.dwd.de/climate_environment/CDC/grids_germany/hourly/radolan/historical/bin/2005/RW-200507.tar.gz" #> [3] "ftp://opendata.dwd.de/climate_environment/CDC/grids_germany/hourly/radolan/historical/bin/2005/RW-200508.tar.gz" #> [4] "ftp://opendata.dwd.de/climate_environment/CDC/grids_germany/hourly/radolan/historical/bin/2005/RW-200509.tar.gz" #> [5] "ftp://opendata.dwd.de/climate_environment/CDC/grids_germany/hourly/radolan/historical/bin/2005/RW-200510.tar.gz" #> [6] "ftp://opendata.dwd.de/climate_environment/CDC/grids_germany/hourly/radolan/historical/bin/2005/RW-200511.tar.gz"  # Set the start and end months urls <- kwb.dwd::get_radolan_urls(   start_daily = "2017-01", end_daily = "2017-03" )  urls$daily_historical_urls #> [1] "ftp://opendata.dwd.de/climate_environment/CDC/grids_germany/daily/radolan/historical/bin/2017/SF201701.tar.gz" #> [2] "ftp://opendata.dwd.de/climate_environment/CDC/grids_germany/daily/radolan/historical/bin/2017/SF201702.tar.gz" #> [3] "ftp://opendata.dwd.de/climate_environment/CDC/grids_germany/daily/radolan/historical/bin/2017/SF201703.tar.gz"

what: List Files or Folders in a FTP Directory — list_url
title: List Files or Folders in a FTP Directory — list_url
text: List Files Folders FTP Directory

title: List Files or Folders in a FTP Directory — list_url
code: list_url(   url = ftp_path_cdc(),   recursive = !is.na(max_depth),   max_depth = NA,   full_info = FALSE,   ... )

title: List Files or Folders in a FTP Directory — list_url
text: url URL FTP server, including "ftp://" recursive logical indicating whether list files subdirectories (default: FALSE) max_depth maximum folder depth consider recursive = TRUE full_info TRUE, path filename returned also file properties. default FALSE. ... arguments passed kwb.dwd:::try_to_get_url, n_trials, timeout, sleep_time

what: Load potential evaporation data from DWD server — load_potential_evaporation_berlin
title: Load potential evaporation data from DWD server — load_potential_evaporation_berlin
text: function loads monthly potential evaporation values Berlin, Germany, Deutscher Wetterdienst (DWD).

title: Load potential evaporation data from DWD server — load_potential_evaporation_berlin
Load potential evaporation data from DWD server — load_potential_evaporation_berlin
text: data frame columns file (name file downloaded   DWD), year (year number integer), month number integer, mean (mean value), sd (standard deviation), min  (minimum value), max (maximum value) potential evaporation   calculated Berlin, Germany

title: Read Binary Radolan File — read_binary_radolan_file
text: Read Binary Radolan File

title: Read Binary Radolan File — read_binary_radolan_file
Read Binary Radolan File — read_binary_radolan_file
text: path path binary Radolan file set_projection_and_extent TRUE (default), projection extent raster object set Radolan specific values, returned kwb.dwd:::get_radolan_projection_string() get_radolan_extension(), respectively.

title: Reads Relevant Radolan Data from rst Database — read_relevant_years_radolan
Reads Relevant Radolan Data from rst Database — read_relevant_years_radolan
text: path path rst database (folder) years vector year numbers read Radolan data files
